content:
TITLE: Generating Sequence Diagram with Mermaid Syntax DESCRIPTION: A Mermaid code snippet that generates a sequence diagram showing interaction between Student, Admin, and Professor entities with auto-numbering and loop functionality. SOURCE: https://github.com/jgraph/www.diagrams.net-source/blob/release/_posts/2024-10-18-uml-diagram-tools.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: mermaid CODE: ``` sequenceDiagram autonumber Student->>Admin: Can I enrol this semester? loop enrolmentCheck Admin->>Admin: Check previous results end Note right of Admin: Exam results may
be delayed Admin-->>Student: Enrolment success Admin->>Professor: Assign student to tutor Professor-->>Admin: Student is assigned ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Draw.io Default Settings in JSON DESCRIPTION: A comprehensive JSON configuration example that defines default settings for draw.io, including fonts, colors, styles, libraries, and diagram parameters. This configuration can be used to customize the diagram editor's appearance and behavior. SOURCE: https://github.com/jgraph/www.diagrams.net-source/blob/release/doc/faq/configure-diagram-editor.md#2025-04-21_snippet_8 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "defaultFonts": ["Helvetica", "Verdana", "Times New Roman", "Garamond", "Comic Sans MS", "Courier New", "Georgia", "Lucida Console", "Tahoma"], "presetColors": ["E6D0DE", "CDA2BE", "B5739D", "E1D5E7", "C3ABD0", "A680B8", "D4E1F5", "A9C4EB", "7EA6E0", "D5E8D4", "9AC7BF", "67AB9F", "D5E8D4", "B9E0A5", "97D077", "FFF2CC", "FFE599", "FFD966", "FFF4C3", "FFCE9F", "FFB570", "F8CECC", "F19C99", "EA6B66"], "defaultColorSchemes": [ [ null, { "fill": "#f5f5f5", "stroke": "#666666" }, { "fill": "#dae8fc", "stroke": "#6c8ebf" }, { "fill": "#d5e8d4", "stroke": "#82b366" }, { "fill": "#ffe6cc", "stroke": "#d79b00" }, { "fill": "#fff2cc", "stroke": "#d6b656" }, { "fill": "#f8cecc", "stroke": "#b85450" }, { "fill": "#e1d5e7", "stroke": "#9673a6" }], [ null, { "fill": "#f5f5f5", "stroke": "#666666", "gradient": "#b3b3b3" }, { "fill": "#dae8fc", "stroke": "#6c8ebf", "gradient": "#7ea6e0" }, { "fill": "#d5e8d4", "stroke": "#82b366", "gradient": "#97d077" }, { "fill": "#ffcd28", "stroke": "#d79b00", "gradient": "#ffa500" }, { "fill": "#fff2cc", "stroke": "#d6b656", "gradient": "#ffd966" }, { "fill": "#f8cecc", "stroke": "#b85450", "gradient": "#ea6b66" }, { "fill": "#e6d0de", "stroke": "#996185", "gradient": "#d5739d" }], [ null, { "fill": "#eeeeee", "stroke": "#36393d" }, { "fill": "#f9f7ed", "stroke": "#36393d" }, { "fill": "#ffcc99", "stroke": "#36393d" }, { "fill": "#cce5ff", "stroke": "#36393d" }, { "fill": "#ffff88", "stroke": "#36393d" }, { "fill": "#cdeb8b", "stroke": "#36393d" }, { "fill": "#ffcccc", "stroke": "#36393d" }] ], "defaultColors": ["none", "FFFFFF", "E6E6E6", "CCCCCC", "B3B3B3", "999999", "808080", "666666", "4D4D4D", "333333", "1A1A1A", "000000", "FFCCCC", "FFE6CC", "FFFFCC", "E6FFCC", "CCFFCC", "CCFFE6", "CCFFFF", "CCE5FF", "CCCCFF", "E5CCFF", "FFCCFF", "FFCCE6", "FF9999", "FFCC99", "FFFF99", "CCFF99", "99FF99", "99FFCC", "99FFFF", "99CCFF", "9999FF", "CC99FF", "FF99FF", "FF99CC", "FF6666", "FFB366", "FFFF66", "B3FF66", "66FF66", "66FFB3", "66FFFF", "66B2FF", "6666FF", "B266FF", "FF66FF", "FF66B3", "FF3333", "FF9933", "FFFF33", "99FF33", "33FF33", "33FF99", "33FFFF", "3399FF", "3333FF", "9933FF", "FF33FF", "FF3399", "FF0000", "FF8000", "FFFF00", "80FF00", "00FF00", "00FF80", "00FFFF", "007FFF", "0000FF", "7F00FF", "FF00FF", "FF0080", "CC0000", "CC6600", "CCCC00", "66CC00", "00CC00", "00CC66", "00CCCC", "0066CC", "0000CC", "6600CC", "CC00CC", "CC0066", "990000", "994C00", "999900", "4D9900", "009900", "00994D", "009999", "004C99", "000099", "4C0099", "990099", "99004D", "660000", "663300", "666600", "336600", "006600", "006633", "006666", "003366", "000066", "330066", "660066", "660033", "330000", "331A00", "333300", "1A3300", "003300", "00331A", "003333", "001933", "000033", "190033", "330033", "33001A"], "defaultVertexStyle": {}, "defaultEdgeStyle": { "edgeStyle": "orthogonalEdgeStyle", "rounded": "0", "jettySize": "auto", "orthogonalLoop": "1" }, "defaultLibraries": "general;images;uml;er;bpmn;flowchart;basic;arrows2", "defaultCustomLibraries": [], "defaultMacroParameters": { "border": false, "toolbarStyle": "inline" }, "css": "", "fontCss": "", "thumbWidth": 46, "thumbHeight": 46, "emptyDiagramXml": "", "emptyLibraryXml": "[]", "defaultEdgeLength": 80 } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: SQL Entity Diagram Generation DESCRIPTION: Insert SQL code to automatically generate entity relationship diagrams. Each database entity is created as a separate shape that can be connected with relationship connectors. SOURCE: https://github.com/jgraph/www.diagrams.net-source/blob/release/_posts/2022-10-21-diagrams-from-code.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring JSON Data Attributes for Embedded Diagrams DESCRIPTION: JSON configuration options for the data-mxgraph attribute that controls diagram embedding behavior. Includes settings for toolbar customization, zoom levels, layer visibility, lightbox behavior, and page display options. SOURCE: https://github.com/jgraph/www.diagrams.net-source/blob/release/doc/faq/embed-html-options.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "xml/url": "data", "toolbar": "[pages|zoom|layers|lightbox|custom]", "toolbar-buttons": {"key": {"title": "string", "image": "base64-encoded", "handler": "function", "enabled": false}}, "toolbar-nohide": true, "max-height": "value", "auto-fit": false, "auto-crop": true, "check-visible-state": false, "lightbox": "[false|open]", "layers": "[index0 index1 ...]", "tooltips": false, "toolbar-position": "[top|inline|bottom]", "zoom": "value", "editable": false, "allow-zoom-in": true, "border": "value", "page": "value", "nav": false, "resize": "[true|false]", "center": "[true|false]", "target": "[self|blank]", "move": true, "title": "value", "edit": "url|_blank" } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Implementing Data-Driven Diagrams in draw.io with JavaScript DESCRIPTION: Adds support for data-driven diagrams in chromeless mode. Allows diagrams to be dynamically updated based on data. SOURCE: https://github.com/jgraph/www.diagrams.net-source/blob/release/doc/faq/plugins.md#2025-04-21_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: JavaScript CODE: ``` // Code not provided in original text ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Defining Template Library Structure in XML for draw.io DESCRIPTION: This XML snippet demonstrates the structure of a template library file for draw.io. It includes definitions for custom libraries (clibs) and individual templates. The file specifies URLs for custom shape libraries and attributes for template diagrams such as section, title, preview image, and associated shape libraries. SOURCE: https://github.com/jgraph/www.diagrams.net-source/blob/release/doc/faq/format-template-library.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: XML CODE: ``` Uhttps://jgraph.github.io/drawio-libs/libs/integration/additional_or_support.xml Uhttps://jgraph.github.io/drawio-libs/libs/integration/ai_machine_learning.xml
